inclusion.criterion: Steroid treatment of at least 3 months and stable steroid dose for at least 2 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients will undergo an ECG and QT parameters will be measured for further analysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects who are postmenopausal (absence of menses for ≥ 2 years confirmed by a follicle stimulating hormone test), or who are surgically sterilized may be enrolled
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active consumption of illicit drugs including cannabis or derivatives for at least 3 months prior to the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but is currently stable on home regimen and responded well to IV steroids. No indication of viral hepatitis or serious psychiatric disorders.
